rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A person enrolled in one or more courses at a academic institution or other place of academic learning
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Student

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An abbreviated course displicine and course number which combined uniquely identifies any university course within that academic institution.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Unique identifier for a course

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A property describing the relationship between a single student and a single record
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Has record

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An integer number which uniquely identifies a course within a particular discipline.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Course number

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Information about single student's participation in a single course in a particular semester
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Record

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An abbreviation for the discipline or department under which an academic course falls
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Discipline of course
